amendment.description: Page 80, after line 2, insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of section 310B(e) of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 1932(e)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 235 (Roll no. 449).

action.text: Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
